name: Akshay Khanna

work_experience.title: Sr. Software Engineer
work_experience.description: * Developed and architected multiple product apps, microservices, REST API & UI components as part of the WSD (workplace management suite) product team using Seismic (React JS), JS, Java & ServiceNow, SQL (Glide) DB & GenAI.* Designed the architecture and led the complete UI heavy development of a complex Scenario Planning (Office space planning & visualization) app, including building a custom data visualization and planning UI component called Stack Plan from scratch and a recursive hierarchical tree visualization.

work_experience.title: Senior Consultant
work_experience.description: * Worked on the development and performance improvement of Atlassian's core UI design components in coordination with their Design System Team. Refactoring and adding features, contributing to open-source libraries, and writing code mods (AST JSCodeShift) for easy shipping of these components.

work_experience.title: Product Developer
work_experience.description: * Part of Tieto's (NORDICS company) Healthcare Product development teams, built 2 apps one was patient list & task management app from scratch for it.	+ Developed user stories, wrote unit tests (jasmine + karma + jUnit), found bugs, and implemented suggestions and enhancements to the product.	+ Participated in grooming, swarming, and retrospective meetings with product OPO's.	+ Used Angular 5+ for front-end development and Java MVC (+ SQL) REST microservices on the back-end.

work_experience.title: Software Engineer
work_experience.description: * Developed user stories and change requests as part of an agile Java backend development team for a Telecom Client Product.* Authored multiple utilities and automation scripts to automate project infrastructure work and improve application stability. These included a Bot for Auto Incident Resolver on BMC IATM (using Java and Sikuli lib), a Bot for clearing stalls (stuck processes) using C#, WPF, and Selenium, an Auto Start/Stop Production Jobs & Server (using C# and Background Worker), and a Server Log Management utility (using C# and Ionic Zip lib).

skills: Here are the updated skills for a Senior Frontend Developer role:Skills:* Languages: JavaScript
and Cross-Functional Teams* Data Structures: Design Patterns for scalability
and complexity analysis* Distributed Systems: Designing and implementing distributed systems

including microservices architecture* Microservices: Building and deploying microservices using Docker and Kubernetes* REST API: Designing and implementing RESTful APIs for frontend and backend applications* Design System & Libraries: Creating and maintaining design systems and libraries for consistent user experiences* System Designing & Architecture Designing: Designing and implementing large-scale systems
including database architecture and system architectureNote that these skills are tailored to a Senior Frontend Developer role
but you can adjust them according to your specific experience and qualifications.
